_meanings:
{@--3@} To hurt, injure,
afflict, torment; as in {#kAmahata#}.

{@--11@} To go
(rarely used in classical literature
in this sense; and when used it is
regarded as a fault of composition);
{%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} {#kuMjaM haMti kfSodarI#} <ls>S. D. 7</ls>; or  
{#tIrTAMtarezu snAnena samupArjitasatkftiH .#} 
{#surasrotasvinImeza haMti saMprati sAdaraM#} <ls>K. P. 7</ls> (given
as an instance of the {#doza#} called  
{#asamarTatpa#}).

{@--1@} To cause to be
killed, kill, slay.

{@--2@} To destroy,
ruin, mar, spoil; <ls>Pt. 1. 363.</ls> --WITH
{#ati#} to injure excessively.
